message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $750000 for the product. I look forward to your response.
Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get this product for closer to $700000. I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value I'll gain from it. What do you think?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to adjust the price to $725000. This reflects a middle ground between our previous offers. I hope this proposal will be more suitable for your budget.
